location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'Sketch Plan of Naseri and Ahwaz showing New Bridge'

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: Printed on paperDimensions: 350 x 323mm, on sheet 432 x 392mm

mods.abstract: The map shows the town of Ahwaz [Ahvaz] and surrounding area, with details of roads and rail lines, as well as features such as bridges, barracks, aerodromes, villages, wharfs, and cemeteries. The map was produced by the General Staff India and includes a printing statement which reads 'Survey Section No. 221 Nov 1938 -- 80'. The map is marked secret (copy no. 6) and is Map No. 3 from the volume 'Military Report on the Anglo-Iranian Oil Company's (South Iranian) Oilfield Area'.
